definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: (prob. he comes to help, Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 168; = Ar. n. pr. div. yaguw3u, We:Skizzen iii, 171; Heid. 2, 146 RS:K 218 (cf. Sem i. 43) Nö:l. c., yet against this LXX Ieouv (i.e. 9; not Iagouv, g), and [[יְ]] (not [[יׇ]]), Lag:M ii. 77; BN 133 Buhl:Edom. 48 f.);—
son of Esau Ge 36:5, Ge 36:14 (both Kt [[יעישׁ]]), v:Ge 36:18, 1Ch 1:35.
son of Rehoboam 2Ch 11:19.—[[יוֹעָשׁ]] v. supr., p. 222 b.
